name: Tale of a Winter Sale
description:
This is a little project I started working on recently. A friend and I came up with the name and premise years ago, but never acted on it. I decided that it was too good to pass up on so here I am with this. If you couldn't tell from the pictures I'm a piss poor artist but I try my best. I prefer doing back end programming but I'm having a blast making this so I hope someone out there finds it fun!

Right now only the "Infinite  mode" is in the game. There are seven difficulty levels and it reaches that point at about 3 and a half minutes. Try to survive the onslaught of tempting deal!

Note: I already know that some of the credits text doesn't fit in the WebGL version.
